title: Keywords, Research and Low Competition Live Chat

tactics.name: low_competition_niche_research
tactics.description: Use keyword tools to identify undersaturated niches with moderate search volume
steps: Filter out branded terms (e.g., Paw Patrol, Minecraft)
Prioritize specific niches (e.g., Ramadan activity books)
Check Amazon search volume and BSR rankings
caveats: Avoid overly specific terms with extremely low search volume
source_quotes: we're looking for things where you're not going to be competing against three thousand other people
we don't want to use a keyword that has like ten searches a month

tactics.name: keyword research + product replication
tactics.description: Identify low-competition keywords with high search volume and replicate successful product structures
steps: Use Publisher Rocket to find keywords with <200 results
Analyze top-ranking products for review counts and BSR trends
Create similar products with slightly modified content/illustrations
caveats: Requires original content creation to avoid infringement
source_quotes: this book has 59 reviews it's priced at 595 but the book is only 30-something pages

tactics.name: simple_line_art
tactics.description: Create low-cost line art illustrations for KDP books using outsourced artists
steps: Use line art instead of colored illustrations
Outsource to illustrators for $2-10 per image
Prioritize simple designs that take 1-2 minutes to create
caveats: Poor execution leads to low BSR
source_quotes: they should all be you know fairly cheap to have created if you are outsourcing

tactics.name: low_competition_niche_hunting
tactics.description: Identify niches with low BSR and minimal competition by filtering for specific keywords and age ranges
steps: Search for niche keywords like 'kids coloring book'
Filter results by BSR and review count thresholds
Test variations like 'adult coloring book' or 'couples activity book'
Prioritize niches with unique content requirements (e.g. scratch-off pages)
caveats: Avoid copyrighted imagery (e.g. Yoda) to prevent account bans
source_quotes: there's not that many there's what two books that might even be competing

heuristics.name: volume_based_niche_selection
heuristics.condition: If search volume is between 200-1000 and BSR <50,000, then prioritize
source_quotes: we want the keywords that you're targeting to have searched for so I don't know if you've picked up on this but there's a lot of things for cup Bulls on here

heuristics.name: low review boost
source_quotes: this book has 53 reviews so still doing well

heuristics.name: low_review_boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize boosting
source_quotes: this one has a really bad sales rank right yeah it's it's it's bad

heuristics.name: review_count_threshold
heuristics.condition: If a niche has fewer than 200 reviews, it's a high-potential target
source_quotes: 132,000 it's only fifty three pages long

claims.statement: Branded terms like Paw Patrol and Minecraft have excessively high competition
source_quotes: stay away from if you see a word you know paw Patrol you don't know what it is

claims.statement: Books with 5,000 BSR can generate $500+ monthly
source_quotes: this book is making at least $500 bucks

claims.statement: KDP allows easy creation of illustrated books with low competition
source_quotes: AMS thing is huge I need to do some but EMS on KDP super easy

claims.statement: Adult coloring books typically command higher prices than children's books
source_quotes: adult let's see here's another one that's not even the same niche

niche_patterns.description: Leverage niche holidays with specific activity formats
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines cultural specificity with low competition
source_quotes: Ramadan activity book... probably one that you know we don't really talk about or think about that much

niche_patterns.example: Ramadan + fasting activity book + basic drawings
niche_patterns.description: Leverage seasonal keywords with minimal production complexity
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines consistent search volume with low creation barriers
source_quotes: these graphics here are very basic

niche_patterns.description: Target niches with specific learning goals and minimal competition
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines targeted content with low review counts and poor execution examples
source_quotes: there's not that many first of all there's other 400 results
